front.title: GMPLS-based Hierarchy LSP creation in Multi-Region and Multi-Layer Networks

abstract.t: This specification describes the hierarchy LSP creation models in the Multi-Region and Multi-Layer Networks (MRN/MLN), and provides the extensions to the existing protocol mechanisms described in [RFC4206], [RFC6107] and [RFC6001] to create the hierarchy LSP through multiple layer networks. Zhang Expires September 2011 [page 1] draft-zhang-ccamp-gmpls-h-lsp-mln-03.txt March 2011
